message: Starting investigation of data_collection directory and data flow patterns
Analyzed core data collection architecture - found sophisticated transactional dual-mode system
Analyzing integration with recipe execution and machine state transitions

DATA COLLECTION INVESTIGATION COMPLETED: Comprehensive analysis of dual-layer data collection architecture, dual-mode operation, machine state integration, database schema, and recipe execution data flow complete. Documented sophisticated transactional system with ACID guarantees and automatic process/idle mode switching.
